meanings.definition: To broadcast a program on cable television.
meanings.sent1: The local news station cablecasted the weather report last night.
meanings.sent2: They cablecasted the live concert for everyone to enjoy.
meanings.sent3: The cat cablecasted its playful antics on the pet channel.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter cablecasted joy to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of the painting cablecasted happiness to all who viewed it.

meanings.definition: The act of transmitting a program on cable television.
meanings.sent1: The cablecasted show was a hit among viewers.
meanings.sent2: I missed the cablecasted of the award ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The cablecasted of the cooking competition made me hungry.
meanings.sent4: His cablecasted of the documentary was informative.
meanings.sent5: The cablecasted of the movie drew a large audience.
